attributes.action: BRENDAN RODGERS NEEDS TO BE FIRED
attributes.additional_details: Brendan Rodgers needs to be fired urgently,last seasons heroics was a complete and utter world away from this seasons form.This seasons form has been utterly revolting.Our defenders have looked lost and disorientated our midfield lacks creativity and motivation and our strikers are demotivated.The money from suarezs sale should've been used better.Its all down to one thing .Mr BRENDAN RODGERS.He needs to go before he ruins liverpool beyond repair
